baseStat.note: Each time a Deep Terror is killed, the Tendril of Corruption suffers D/2 damage

actions.value: Whenever Hollow Scholar kills a summon perform:

baseStat.note: At the start of each turn, remove the closest one 1-hex hazardous terrain tile

actions.value: Set hit points to double the Incarnate's maximum hit points

baseStat.note: If its hit points would drop below 10, it becomes 10 instead.

subActions.value: %game.action.target% one enemy within two hexes of either the Tendril of Corruption or a Dark Pit overlay

special.value: The Tendril of Corruption and the summoned Deep Terror gain %game.action.shield% 1 for the round

baseStat.note: Has a hit point value equal to your maximum hit point value.

rules.note: Return your figure to the entrance hex and return all living City Guards to %game.mapMarker.a%
special rules of the Ice Wraiths are not implemented

rules.note: Move token to Low pressure section

in an adjacent unoccupied

solo.char-am-deck: 使用該角色攻擊修正牌組

solo-103.1: The next two times an enemy suffers damage from attacking you, that enemy gains %game.condition.immobilize%.

solo-109.1: During your turn, forgo your top action to play a summon action from a card in your lost pile, ignoring two ^scrapx^.

solo-114.1: During your attack ability gain %game.condition.wound% to add +3 %game.action.attack% to one attack. If you kill the target perform "%game.action.heal% 3, Self".

solo-119.1: During your Attack ability, add +1 %game.action.attack% to one attack. Whenever this item is refreshed, one adjacent enemy suffers 1 damage.

solo-120.1: During your melee Attack ability, gain %game.condition.chill% to add %game.condition.chill% to the attack. After the attack flip, this card.
solo-120.2: During your melee Attack ability, if you do not have %game.condition.wound%, gain %game.condition.wound% to add %game.condition.wound% to the attack. After the attack flip, this card.

solo-121.1: During your turn, play one level 5 or lower card from your hand or discard pile and immediately perform a %data.characterColored.gemstone:Crystalize% %data.characterIconColoredBg.gemstone% action from that card.

solo-123.1: Whenever you %game.condition.dodge% an attack, you may spend this item instead of discarding a card from your hand.

solo-134.1: Any time you kill an enemy during your turn, gain %game.action.shield% 1 for the rest of the round.

solo-135.1: During your Heal action, double the value of the Heal.

solo-136.1: During your ranged attack, add +2 %game.action.attack% and gain Advantage on the entire Attack action, but suffer 2 damage for each attack made.

solo-137.1: Any time you perform a melee attack, add %game.action.pierce% 1 to the Attack.

solo-138.1: During your action where an obstacle is created, create one additional obstacle and apply all effects of the action to it.

solo-139.1: Any time you perform an %data.characterColored.mindthief:Augment% action, add +1 %game.action.attack% to the entire action.

solo-140.1: When damaged by an attack, you may %game.element.consume.light% to gain %game.action.shield% 3 for the attack.

solo-141.1: During your turn, you or any one ally may Refresh %game.card.refresh% one of your spent or consumed items.

solo-142.1: When a summon you own is damaged by an attack, it suffers no damage instead.

solo-143.1:
During your turn, gain %game.condition.invisible% and create
%game.element.dark%

solo-144.1: During your turn, %game.condition.poison% and %game.condition.curse% one enemy within %game.action.range:3%.

solo-145.1: Any time you perform a melee attack and you have exactly 1 hit point, add +2 %game.action.attack% to the Attack.

solo-146.1: After performing any %data.characterColored.music-note:Song% action, immediately perform an %game.action.attack% 2 or %game.action.move% 2 action.

solo-147.1: Any time you perform a %data.characterColored.angry-face:Doom% action, %game.condition.muddle% the target of the %data.characterColored.angry-face:Doom%.

solo-148.1: Any time an ally performs a Medical Pack or Large Medical Pack action, they add +1 %game.action.heal% to their Heal.

solo-149.1: If you move 5 or more hexes on your turn, create any element.

solo-150.1: After performing a %data.characterColored.two-mini:Command% action, play one card from your hand and immediately perform the same side of the card (top or bottom) as the %data.characterColored.two-mini:Command% action.

solo-151.1: During your melee attack, add %game.condition.poison% and %game.condition.wound% to the entire action.

solo-164.1: When you reveal cards from any deck, reveal one additional card.

solo-248.1: During your attack ability, move one character token on one of your persistent abilities backward one slot and add +X %game.action.attack% to one attack, where X is the number of active persistent abilities.

solo-249.1: During our turn, perform one of the two following abilities: Lose one card from your hand to gain 3 %data.action.custom.fh-hourglass%.
solo-249.2: %game.card.recover% up to two of your discarded cards

solo-250.2: All your banners are treated as additionally occupying the hex of the attack target of their bonuses and that hex is treated as occupied by an ally this round.

solo-251.1: Place one %data.action.custom.fh-shadow% in an adjacent hex. %game.element.dark%

solo-252.1: On the next three deaths of any of your summons, %game.elementHalf:earth|dark% and perform:

solo-253.1: During your ranged attack ability while in %game.characterIconIdentity.geminate.1%, gain advantage for one attack, then flip this card over.
solo-253.2: When an enemy performs an attack targeting you while you are in %game.characterIconIdentity.geminate.0%, the attacker gains disadvantage, then flip this card over.

solo-254.1: During your turn, activate all your %data.action.custom.fh-infusion% as if you just performed a %data.action.custom.fh-infusion% action.

solo-255.1: During your turn, you may create either one 1-hex obstacle or hazardous terrain tile in an empty tile within %game.action.range:2%.

solo-257.1: When you create a trap, place a character token on it. Monsters do not treat the trap as negative. Remove the token when you %game.card.recover% this item.

solo-258.1: When you suffer damage, if your hit point value is reduced to below half your maximum, perform:
solo-258.2: This heal is not affect by and cannot remove negative conditions.

solo-259.1: During an attack ability you grant an ally, add %game.action.push% 2 to one of their attacks, then flip this card over.
solo-259.2: During your attack ability you, add %game.action.pull% 2 to one attack, then flip this card over.

solo-260.1: During your attack ability, add %game.condition.brittle% one attack and create one 1-hex icy terrain tile in the featureless hex occupied by the target.

solo-261.1: Remove all damage and negative conditions from one of your summons, then %data.action.custom.fh-mode% to that summon.

solo-262.1: During your move ability, when you have %game.characterIconIdentityColored.drill.1% or %game.characterIconIdentityColored.drill.2%, add +1 %game.action.move%, then flip this card over at the end of your turn.
solo-262.2: During your turn when you have %game.characterIconIdentityColored.drill.3%, perform:
solo-262.4: then flip this card over at the end of your turn.

solo-263.1: Whenever you gain %game.condition.invisible% perform a teleport ability while you have %game.condition.invisible%, after the ability perform: %game.condition.muddle% %game.action.range:1%

solo-264.1: When you rest, you may keep up to three %data.action.custom.fh-tides% cards in your active area.

solo-34.1: At the end of your turn, create one 4 damage %game.condition.poison% trap in an adjacent empty hex.

solo-40.1: Add +1 %game.action.move% to all your movement while you are at full health.

solo-41.1: During your turn remove one damage token from one %data.characterColored.skull:Spirit% %data.characterIconColoredBg.skull%. This %data.characterColored.skull:Spirit% may immediately take a turn without receiving a damage token.

solo-42.1: Whenever you given an ally a %data.characterColored.leaf:Prayer% ability card, that ally may perform "%game.action.heal% 2, Self".

solo-45.1: During your turn, perform "%game.action.pull% 2, Self toward one enemy within %game.action.range:3%".

solo-47.1: While %data.characterColored.tusks:Mounted% on a summon, you can apply your %game.items.slots.small% items item effects to the summon instead.

solo-48.1: During your turn, %game.element.consume.wild% to perform one of the following: %game.action.move% 2, %game.action.jump%, %game.element.air% | %game.action.heal% 3, Self, %game.element.light% | %game.action.attack% 2, %game.element.fire%.

solo-50.1: During your turn, when you %game.element.consume.wild% an element, do not move the consumed element to the Inert column.

solo-51.1: When attacked, you may %game.element.consume.fire% to gain %game.action.retaliate% 3 for the attack.

solo-53.1: Once each turn, during your turn, you may remove one condition from an adjacent figure and place that condition on this card if it is not already on this card. During your turn, one adjacent figure gains all conditions on this card, then consume %game.card.lost% this item.

solo-56.1: At the end of your turn create one 3 damage %game.condition.immobilize% trap in an adjacent empty hex.

solo-57.1: You are immune to %game.condition.muddle%. At the end of each round, if you have %game.condition.wound% gain %game.condition.regenerate%.

14.1: The Hound is the Ghost Wolf.
14.2: The Earth Demon is the Deep Earth. It has Hx2 hit points, where H is an elite Earth Demon's regular hit point value.
14.3: The Flame Demon is the High Flame. Add +2 to its Retaliate, the Range of its Retaliate, and its Shield.
14.4: All Giant Vipers add +1 Attack to all their Attacks.

solo-134.1: À chaque fois que vous tuez un adversaire pendant votre tour, gagnez %game.action.shield% 1 pour le reste du round.

solo-135.1: Pendant votre action de Soin, doublez la valeur du Soin.

solo-136.1: Pendant votre attaque à distance, ajoutez +2 %game.action.attack% et gagnez Avantage pour la totalité de l'action d'Attaque, mais subissez 2 dégâts pour chaque attaque réalisée.

solo-137.1: À chaque fois que vous réalisez une attaque de mêlée, ajoutez %game.action.pierce% 1 à l'Attaque.

solo-138.1: Pendant l'action lors de laquelle un obstacle est créé, créez un obstacle additionnel et appliquez tous les effets de l'action à celui-ci.

solo-139.1: À chaque fois que vous réalisez une action %data.characterColored.mindthief:Augment%, ajoutez +1 %game.action.attack% à la totalité de l'action.

solo-140.1: Lorsque vous êtes blessé par une attaque, vous pouvez %game.element.consume.light% pour gagner %game.action.shield% 3 pour l'attaque.

solo-141.1: Pendant votre tour, vous pouvez Rafraîchir %game.card.refresh% un de vos objets épuisé ou consommé.

solo-142.1: Quand une de vos invocations est blessée par une attaque, elle ne subit aucun dégât.

solo-143.1: Durant votre tour, devenez %game.condition.invisible% et créez %game.element.dark%

solo-144.1: Pendant votre tour, empoisonnez %game.condition.poison% et maudissez %game.condition.curse% un adversaire à portée %game.action.range:3%.

solo-145.1: À chaque fois que vous réalisez une attaque de mêlée et que vous avez exactement 1 point de vie, ajoutez +2 %game.action.attack% à l'Attaque.

solo-146.1: Après avoir réalisé une action Chanson %data.characterColored.music-note:Song%, réalisez immédiatement une action %game.action.attack% 2 ou une action %game.action.move% 2.

solo-147.1: À chaque fois que vous réalisez une action Jugement %data.characterColored.angry-face:Doom%, infligez %game.condition.muddle% à la cible du jugement.

solo-148.1: À chaque fois qu'un allié réalise une action Kit de Soins ou Grand Kit de Soins, il ajoute +1 %game.action.heal% à leur soin.

solo-149.1: Si vous vous déplacez de 5 hexagones ou plus pendant votre tour, créez n'importe quel élément.

solo-150.1: Après avoir réalisez une action %data.characterColored.two-mini:Command%, jouez une carte de votre main et réalisez immédiatement le même côté de carte (supérieur ou inférieur) que l'action %data.characterColored.two-mini:Command%.

solo-134.1: 차례 중 적을 죽일 때마다, 해당 라운드 동안 %game.action.shield% 1 획득.

solo-135.1: 치료 행동 중, 해당 치료 수치가 2배로 증가.

solo-136.1: 원거리 공격 중, 해당 공격 행동 전체에 +2 %game.action.attack% 추가 및 이익을 받음. 단, 그러한 공격 각각에 대해 피해 2점 입음.

solo-137.1: 근접 공격을 수행할 때마다, 해당 공격에 %game.action.pierce% 1 추가.

solo-138.1: 장애물이 생성되는 행동 중, 추가로 장애물을 하나 더 생성하고 해당 행동의 모든 효과를 추가 장애물에도 적용.

solo-139.1: %data.characterColored.mindthief:Augment% 행동을 수행할 때마다, 해당 행동 전체에 +1 %game.action.attack% 추가.

solo-140.1: 공격에 의해 피해를 입게 될 때, %game.element.consume.light% 를 통해 해당 공격에 대해 %game.action.shield% 3 획득 가능.

solo-141.1: 차례 중, 장착자 본인 또는 아군 하나가 자신의 소모되거나 고갈된 아이템 1개 %game.card.refresh% 가능.

solo-142.1: 장착자 소유 소환물이 공격에 의해 피해를 입게 될 때, 피해를 입지 않음.

solo-143.1:
차례 중, %game.condition.invisible% 획득 및 어둠 원소 생성.
%game.element.dark%

solo-144.1: 차례 중, %game.action.range:3% 내에 있는 적 하나에게 %game.condition.poison% 및 %game.condition.curse% 적용.

solo-145.1: 체력이 정확히 1인 상태에서 근접 공격을 수행할 때마다, 해당 공격에 +2 %game.action.attack% 추가.

solo-146.1: 매번 %data.characterColored.music-note:Song% 행동 수행 후, 즉시 %game.action.attack% 2 행동 또는 %game.action.move% 2 행동 수행.

solo-148.1: 아군이 “의료품 꾸러미” 또는 “큰 의료품 꾸러미” 행동을 수행할 때마다, 해당 치료에 +1 %game.action.heal% 추가.

solo-149.1: 차례 중 5칸 이상을 이동한 경우, 아무 원소나 1개 생성.

solo-150.1: %data.characterColored.two-mini:Command% 행동 수행 후, 손에 있는 카드 1장을 플레이하고 즉시 해당 카드에서 해당 %data.characterColored.two-mini:Command% 과 동일한 부분(상단 또는 하단) 행동 수행.

solo-151.1: 근접 공격 중, 해당 공격 행동 전체에 %game.condition.poison% 및 %game.condition.wound% 추가.

solo-164.1: 장착자가 아무 덱에서나 카드를 공개할 때마다, 카드 한 장을 추가로 공개.

solo-134.1: Каждый раз, когда вы убиваете врага в ваш ход, получите свойство «%game.action.shield% 1» до конца раунда.

solo-135.1: Во время вашей способности лечения удвойте показатели всех действий «Лечение».

solo-136.1: Во время вашей дальней атаки добавьте +2 %game.action.attack% и получите преимущество. Применяйте этот эффект ко всем атакам текущей способности, но получайте 2 урона за каждую проведенную атаку.

solo-137.1: Каждый раз, когда вы проводите ближнюю атаку, добавляйте эффект «%game.action.pierce% 1».

solo-138.1: Во время вашей способности, при применении которой вы создаёте препятствие, создайте ещё 1 препятствие и примените к нему все эффекты этой способности.

solo-139.1: Каждый раз, когда вы применяете способность с атрибутом «%data.characterColored.mindthief:Augment%» добавляйте +1 %game.action.attack% ко всем атакам этой способности.

solo-140.1: Когда вы получаете урон от атаки, можете использовать %game.element.consume.light%, чтобы получить свойство «%game.action.shield% 3» для этой атаки.

solo-141.1: В ваш ход вы или любой союзник разверните %game.card.refresh% 1 свою повёрнутую или потраченную карту предмета.

solo-142.1: Когда призванное вами создание получает урон от атаки, оно вместо этого не получает урон.

solo-143.1:
В ваш ход получите состояние %game.condition.invisible%» и повысьте заряд
%game.element.dark%

solo-144.1: В ваш ход примените эффекты «%game.condition.poison%» и «%game.condition.curse%» к одному врагу в пределах %game.action.range:3%.

solo-145.1: Каждый раз, когда вы проводите ближнюю атаку, имея ровно 1 ОЗ, добавляйте +2 %game.action.attack% к этой атаке.

solo-146.1: После применения любой способности с атрибутом %data.characterColored.music-note:Song%, немедленно выполните действие «%game.action.attack% 2» или «%game.action.move% 2».

solo-147.1: Каждый раз, когда вы применяете способность с атрибутом «%data.characterColored.angry-face:Doom%», цель этой способность получает состояние «%game.condition.muddle%».

solo-148.1: Каждый раз, когда союзник применяет способность карты «Аптечка» или «Большая аптечка», он добавляет +1 %game.action.heal% к лечению.

solo-149.1: Если вы передвигаетесь в ваш ход не менее чем на 5 клеток, повысьте заряд любой стихии.

solo-150.1: После применения способности с атрибутом «%data.characterColored.two-mini:Command%», разыграйте карту с вашей руки и немедленно примените способность с той же половины карты, на которой находилась применённая способность с атрибутом «%data.characterColored.two-mini:Command%».

solo-151.1: Во время вашей атаки ближнего боя добавляйте «%game.condition.poison%» и «%game.condition.wound%» ко всем атакам данной способности.

solo-164.1: Раскрывая карты любой колоды, раскрывайте 1 дополнительную карту.

14.2: Земляной демон — это Недра. Количество его ОЗ равно СОЗ×2, где СОЗ — стандартное количество очков здоровья мощного земляного демона.
14.3: Огненный демон — это Пламя. Добавьте +2 к показателям его свойств «Щит» и «Ответный удар», а также к дальности свойства «Ответный удар».
14.4: Все гигантские гадюки добавляют +1 ко всем своим атакам.
